title: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry pancetta in a pan until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk eggs, parmesan, and pecorino.
Toss cooked spaghetti with pancetta and egg mixture.
Season with salt and pepper and serve.

title: Avocado Toast
steps: Mash the avocado with lemon juice.
Spread mashed avocado on toasted bread.
Season with salt, pepper, and drizzle with olive oil.

title: Classic Burger
steps: Form beef into patties and season with salt and pepper.
Cook patties in a pan or on the grill to desired doneness.
Assemble the burger with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and the patty.

title: Sushi Platter
steps: Cook sushi rice and season with rice vinegar.
Slice salmon and cucumber into thin strips.
Place nori sheet on a bamboo mat and spread rice evenly.
Add salmon and cucumber, then roll tightly.
Slice the roll into pieces and serve with soy sauce and wasabi.
